messages.title: Fighting for their future
messages.content: New Lib Dem plans will give every child a real chance.

keyPolicies.policyDescription: Support for a £700 tax cut to make taxes fairer.
Plans to give every child a real chance with smaller class sizes and more one-to-one tuition.

mentions.tacticalSituation: Can't win here: Labour can't win here, polls show that only the Liberal Democrats can beat the Conservatives.

issues.education: New Lib Dem plans will give every child a real chance with smaller class sizes and more one-to-one tuition.
issues.environment: Martin Tod's 10:10 Diary - backing to cut carbon emissions by 10% in 2010 and promoting Winchester Action on Climate Change.

politicalExperience.achievements: Martin Tod is a strong campaigner who's been active locally – working with residents to stop over-development in Hursley and building footpaths in Kings Worthy. He recently spent the day working hard with other volunteers to restore the Itchen Navigation near the Nuns Stream in Winchester.

images.caption: New Lib Dem plans will give every child a real chance.
